description: This file defines a React component called ProtectedRoute which acts as a guard for routes, ensuring that only authenticated users with optional specific roles can access certain parts of the frontend application. It manages loading state, redirects unauthenticated users to sign-in, and handles role-based authorization.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute({ children, requireRole })
methods.description: React component that guards its children based on user authentication and optional role requirement. Handles loading state and redirects accordingly.
